clicked.description:
An event that triggers when the SendGrid API detects that a link in the email has been clicked on by the recipient.(Must have 'Click Tracking' enabled)

Note: This may be subject to privacy regulations of the email recipient's country

email.description: The designated recipient of the email

eventId.description: The ID for the webhook event

messageId.description: The ID for the sent email message

reason.description: The reason this event was triggered

timestamp.description: A UTC datetime representing when the event was triggered

url.description: The destination URL of the link that was clicked

urlOffset.description: A zero-based index, ordered by first appearance, of which link was clicked in an email when it shares a "url" with another link

clicked.title: Email Link Clicked

deferred.description: An event that triggers when the SendGrid API fails a delivery attempt to the recipient's email server. (This will often re-attempt a few times before stopping)

attempt.description: The delivery attempts that have been made for the sent email

eventId.description: The ID for the webhook event

messageId.description: The ID for the sent email message

timestamp.description: A UTC datetime representing when the event was triggered

deferred.title: Email Deferred

delivered.description: An event that triggers when the SendGrid API delivers a given email to the recipient's email server. (This can also trigger alongside email bounces among other events)

email.description: The designated recipient of the email

eventId.description: The ID for the webhook event

messageId.description: The ID for the sent email message

timestamp.description: A UTC datetime representing when the event was triggered

delivered.title: Email Delivered

opened.description:
An event that triggers when the SendGrid API detects that an email has been opened by the recipient. (Must have 'Open Tracking' enabled)

Note: This may be subject to privacy regulations of the email recipient's country

eventId.description: The ID for the webhook event

timestamp.description: A UTC datetime representing when the event was triggered
